tool_description: Creates organized collections of scripture passages with personal or scholarly annotations, notes, and study materials.

collection_name.description: Name for the annotated scripture collection

passages.description: Array of scripture references to include in collection

annotations.description: Corresponding annotations for each passage (same order as passages)

annotation_type.description: Type of annotations: personal, scholarly, devotional, or theological

organization_method.description: How to organize: biblical_order, thematic, chronological, or custom

include_passage_text.description: Include full passage text or just references

output_format.description: Output format: study_guide, reference_list, or detailed_notes

error_messages: Empty collection name: Provide a name for the scripture collection.
Passages and annotations mismatch: Number of passages must equal number of annotations.
Too many passages: Maximum 50 passages allowed per collection.
Invalid annotation type: Use one of [personal, scholarly, devotional, theological].
Invalid organization method: Use one of [biblical_order, thematic, chronological, custom].
Invalid output format: Use one of [study_guide, reference_list, detailed_notes].
usage: Provide collection name, passages array, and corresponding annotations. Optionally specify organization and formatting preferences. Returns organized annotated study collection.

passage_count.description: Total number of passages in collection

organized_passages.description: Passages organized according to selected method

organized_annotations.description: Annotations in same order as organized passages

study_outline.description: Suggested study outline for the collection

collection_summary.description: Overview summary of the annotated collection
